DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate use Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation ( NMES ) provide efficient method treat neonate dysfunctional oral feeding dysphagia . This study attempt determine NMES apply neonate 36-42 week post-conception age ( PCA ) decrease need nasogastric tube ( NG ) gastrostomy tube ( G-TUBE ) . Increase rate neonate complete full oral feed , improve swallow skill , increase oral intake calorie , gain weight .
DOC.brief_title: Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation ( NMES ) Dysphagia Neonates
DOC.criteria: Male female . Meet diagnostic criterion dysphagia symptom use NOMAS VFSS . Infants intraventricular hemorrhage ( IVH ) hypoxic event include . Infants take less 510 % target volume mouth age 3642 week PCA . Multiple swallow clear bolus follow suck include desaturation < 80 % bradycardia < 80 bpm . Apnea spell feed . Aspiration penetration VFSS Known neurologic neurodegenerative disorder . Chromosomal anomaly syndrome . Cleft lip palate . Birth defect . Unresolved cutaneous rash area electrode placement . Medical condition contraindication NMES .
